summary: The Game Boy Advance (GBA) is a popular handheld gaming device made by Nintendo. It was released in 2001 as the next version after the Game Boy Color. The GBA has a 32-bit processor and offers color graphics. Over time, Nintendo released different versions, like the Game Boy Advance SP with a foldable design and a backlit screen. In 2005, they introduced the smaller Game Boy Micro. The GBA series sold over 81 million units worldwide. Its games can also be played on the Nintendo DS.
title: Game Boy Advance
